line.text: Love is too young to know what conscience is
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Yet who knows not conscience is born of love
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then gentle cheater urge not my amiss
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Lest guilty of my faults thy sweet self prove
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For thou betraying me I do betray
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: My nobler part to my gross body treason
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: My soul doth tell my body that he may
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Triumph in love flesh stays no farther reason
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But rising at thy name doth point out thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As his triumphant prize proud of this pride
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: He is contented thy poor drudge to be
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To stand in thy affairs fall by thy side
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: No want of conscience hold it that I call
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Her love for whose dear love I rise and fall
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
